name: Think To Die 2
description:
Features:
  • Over 90 unique levels
  • Playable in an optional cartoon look
  • New graphics
  • Funny & Fast gameplay
  • Auto Saves after passing a level
  • Option to skip any level (By pressing F10) in case you get stuck
  • No paid DLCs (All updates will be free)
  • Single-Player only & playable offline
  • And much much more...

Control-Keys:
  • W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move
  • F10 skips a level
  • F8 flips camera
  • "C" changes player
  • "R" restarts level
  • "F1"enables/disables performance profiler
